programme.title: Astrid i Raphaëlle
programme.desc: Pracująca w policji 30-letnia Astrid Nielesen (Sara Mortensen) ma zespół Aspergera. W rozwiązywaniu zagadek kryminalnych pomaga jej niezwykła pamięć. Przy współpracy z detektyw Raphaëlle Coste (Lola Dewaere) funkcjonariuszka prowadzi sprawy zbyt trudne dla przeciętnego śledczego, takie jak przypadek śmierci ze strachu, morderstwa popełnionego w pomieszczeniu zamkniętym od wewnątrz czy zgonu wskutek utonięcia, ale bez kropli wody w pobliżu ofiary.

programme.title: Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem
Kochanie, chyba cię zabiłem
programme.desc: Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem: Directed by Jakub Niescierow. With Zbigniew Zamachowski, Arkadiusz Jakubik, Ireneusz Czop, Marcin Korcz. An employee at a video rental shop accidentally discovers a recording of a murder. The killer is the husband, the victim is his unfaithful wife. Hoping for easy money, the kid decides to blackmail the husband. Together, they set off to the coast, where the killer keeps his saving in a bank deposit. They are followed by two rather incompetent cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3686942/","name":"Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZmZGQ0ODctMmU0OS00MTU5LWIyN2UtZmUxZjI2MTM2MmY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An employee at a video rental shop accidentally discovers a recording of a murder. programme.title: Sole
Sole
programme.desc: Sole: Directed by Carlo Sironi. With Claudio Segaluscio, Sandra Drzymalska, Bruno Buzzi, Marco Felli. Lena is seven months pregnant and she's ready to sell the baby in her belly. Ermanno agrees to pretend to be the father. Fabio, the uncle of Ermanno, will pay them to buy the child that he and his wife Bianca cannot have. A fake adoption between relatives, a loophole to bypass the law cause in Italy the surrogate motherhood is forbidden. A world in which money is the only standard of value, the only thing that matter. Ermanno and Lena are two strangers that must pretend in public to be a couple and live together until the delivery. They are used to only think about themselves and they fight all the time. But living side by side they start becoming what they were only pretending to be." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9648994/","name":"Sole","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYwMjI2YjUtMzAyOS00YWViLWJiY2UtYzcwZTliYjk5YTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzMxMDgxNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lena is seven months pregnant and she's ready to sell the baby in her belly. programme.title: We mnie
programme.desc: Sandra (Małgorzata Gorol) świętuje swój wieczór panieński. Zbliża się dzień ślubu, ale przedtem musi poddać się aborcji - płód ma wady genetyczne. Do szpitala jedzie z nią narzeczony. Z każdą kolejną minutą mężczyzna wydaje się Sandrze coraz bardziej obcy. Po zabiegu kobieta postanawia szczerze z nim porozmawiać.

programme.title: Mój kraj taki piękny
programme.desc: W Polsce trwa spór pomiędzy dwoma ugrupowaniami - narodowcami i ich przeciwnikami. Grzegorz Paprzycki dokumentuje przebieg tych potyczek. Pojawia się w samym środku wydarzeń, podczas których niejednokrotnie dochodzi do aktów przemocy. Film stanowi subiektywne spojrzenie na konflikt, który toczy się na polskich ulicach. Za swój obraz reżyser otrzymał Złotego Lajkonika na Krakowskim Festiwalu Filmowym.

programme.title: Sufit
Katto
programme.desc: Olavi (Juho Milonoff) się rozwodzi. Szukając zapomnienia od związanych z tym nieprzyjemnych okoliczności, przyjeżdża do letniego domku. Na miejscu się przekonuje, że sufit w tajemniczy sposób się obniżył.

I recently gave it another try, thinking it couldn't possibly have been THAT bad. Nope. I was right the first time. Again, excruciating to watch. programme.title: OUTATIME: Saving the DeLorean Time Machine
Wehikuł czasu - DeLorean
OUTATIME: Saving the DeLorean Time Machine
programme.desc: OUTATIME: Saving the DeLorean Time Machine: Directed by Steve Concotelli. With Sean Bishop, Dan Botkin, Mark Dehlinger, Eddie Dennis. OUTATIME... tells the incredible comeback story of the world's most famous movie car - the DeLorean Time Machine from Back to the Future. Plagued by souvenir hunters, rats, and the elements, this cinematic icon seemed destined for the junkyard. Out of Time... chronicles the efforts of Back to the Future Co-creator / Producer Bob Gale, Universal Studios, and the trilogy's dedicated fan community as they tirelessly work together to bring the Time Machine back to life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4525694/","name":"OUTATIME: Saving the DeLorean Time Machine","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk5Nzg5MjM0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzEzMzIzNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"OUTATIME... tells the incredible comeback story of the world's most famous movie car - the DeLorean Time Machine from Back to the Future. programme.title: Rykoszety
Rykoszety
programme.desc: Rykoszety: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Two coal miner brothers react differently to the oppressive police state. While Tadek prefers to retreat into neutrality, Janek chooses active engagement in the democratic underground. When Janek asks Tadek to store some anti-government leaflets on the second anniversary of Solidarity's 1980 strikes, he triggers a spiral of events that will have everyone's allegiances and characters severely tested." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8658144/","name":"Rykoszety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc0ZGJlOTUtYWM5NS00MjY3LWE5YzYtNWQxMjYyNDU5NjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Tumbledown: Directed by Sean Mewshaw. With Rebecca Hall, Jason Sudeikis, Joe Manganiello, Dianna Agron. A young woman struggles to move on with her life after the death of her husband, an acclaimed folk singer, when a brash New York writer forces her to confront her loss and the ambiguous circumstances of his death." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2338424/","name":"Tumbledown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MzkwOTQ1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjcxMzg2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman struggles to move on with her life after the death of her husband, an acclaimed folk singer, when a brash New York writer forces her to confront her loss and the ambiguous circumstances of his death.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2338424/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"karthikchsharry"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Almost touches Great - But settles for Decent","reviewBody":"Tumbledown is that kind of movie which makes you feel "Oh! It's good. But it should have been better". You'd almost feel sorry for the entire cast because they have given such exceptional performances only to be let down by clichéd writing towards the end. But it still is a Dramedy worth watching.

Coming to the performances, there are absolutely no complaints here. I can safely say that Jason Sudeikis steals the show with his charm and timing. Rebecca Hall gives her best and suits for the role well. In fact we can watch the movie just for the leads' performances. The supporting cast does justice to their roles.

Verdict: Go for it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7234,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-02-05","keywords":"singer songwriter,widow single man relationship,log cabin,boxer the dog,dog","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2342696217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NTk3MDg0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDQ0MjU2NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NTk3MDg0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDQ0MjU2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman struggles to move on with her life after the death of her husband, an acclaimed folk singer, when a brash New York writer forces her to confront her loss and the ambiguous circumstances of his death."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0356017/","name":"Rebecca Hall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837177/","name":"Jason Sudeikis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001100/","name":"Blythe Danner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0582950/","name":"Sean Mewshaw"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0545944/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0534767/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0582950/","name":"Sean Mewshaw"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597917/","name":"Desi van Til"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Last Rampage: The Escape of Gary Tison
Last Rampage: The Escape of Gary Tison
programme.desc: Last Rampage: The Escape of Gary Tison: Directed by Dwight H. Little. With Robert Patrick, Heather Graham, Bruce Davison, Alex MacNicoll. The true story of the infamous prison break of Gary Tison and Randy Greenwalt from the Arizona State prison in Florence, AZ, in the summer of 1978." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5833186/","name":"Last Rampage: The Escape of Gary Tison","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU2ZGNkNDctYTJkYS00YzQ0LTk3MzUtZDI1MjZkYTFhNmFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTcwMjE4MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The true story of the infamous prison break of Gary Tison and Randy Greenwalt from the Arizona State prison in Florence, AZ, in the summer of 1978.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5833186/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ourclub"},"dateCreated":"2018-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Saguaros vs. Joshua Trees","reviewBody":"Way too many Joshua Trees for the actual territory this crime spree covered. The Tisons meandered through Arizona towards Yuma, then up to Flagstaff, briefly into eastern NM, southwestern CO and back into AZ towards Casa Grande. They were ultimately stopped near AZ City. Someone noted in the "Errors" section that saguaros only grow in southern AZ. While most saguaros grow down Tucson way, you will find them naturally from Phoenix south and out along I-8 to Yuma. There are a lot growing in areas near Casa Grande so that part is accurate. Joshua Trees grow primarily in CA so there would have been few to none in the areas covered by Tison gang. This was probably filmed in Mojave.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1740,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2017-09-22","keywords":"florence arizona,arizona,arizona desert,arizona state prison,quartzsite arizona","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3424893209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJhZjFjNWMtOGE1Ni00NDM4LWI5NmUtY2NmODk0ZjVhNWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJhZjFjNWMtOGE1Ni00NDM4LWI5NmUtY2NmODk0ZjVhNWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1978 convicted murderer Gary Tison (Robert Patrick) and his cellmate Randy Greenawalt (Chris Browning) staged a daring escape from an Arizona State Prison, with the help of Tison's three teenage sons. Their murderous rampage through the southwestern desert shocked the nation with its brutality. While Sheriff Cooper (Bruce Davison) hunted them down, Tison's wife (Heather Graham) vehemently defended her family in the press."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001598/","name":"Robert Patrick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001287/","name":"Heather Graham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001117/","name":"Bruce Davison"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0514546/","name":"Dwight H. programme.title: Nan fang che zhan de ju hui
Jezioro dzikich gęsi
Nan Fang Che Zhan De Ju Hui
programme.desc: Nan fang che zhan de ju hui: Directed by Yi'nan Diao. With Ge Hu, Gwei Lun-Mei, Fan Liao, Regina Wan. A gangster on the run sacrifices everything for his family and a woman he meets while on the lam." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9647768/","name":"Nan fang che zhan de ju hui","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg1ZTZlMmUtM2Y3Yy00YTJjLWJkMTUtZmU2NGU0M2JlYWViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"A gangster on the run sacrifices everything for his family and a woman he meets while on the lam.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9647768/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ayoreinf"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A rare gem of a movie","reviewBody":"I don't rate films 10 very often, you can check my rating history and see for yourselves. this one is a rare combination of technical mastery, as manifest in superb chinematography and lighting work, great editing, amazing acting, that is mainly the two leads who really shine all the way through, Ge Hu as the male lead and Lun-Mei Kwei who in my humble opinion has the most expressive poker face I've ever seen. That is as long as she carries her poker face, when the time comes you'll find she does have more than one facial expression.\n\nOn top of all that, we get a tight story of a Greek tragedy proportions set in modern china, depicting a dark and un forgiving world that borrows a lot from the classics of Melville. If you remember Melville's attitude to the famous "honor among thieves" you'll know what to expect from this movie too. But do come with an open mind - you'll be blown away.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6261,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-06","keywords":"motorcycle,gangster,prostitute,police,boat","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Wild Goose Lake","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1856159257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc0YzliNDItNzNjNy00ZTcxLTk1ODUtOGM0Y2Y2ZGQ4YTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc0YzliNDItNzNjNy00ZTcxLTk1ODUtOGM0Y2Y2ZGQ4YTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2396101/","name":"Ge Hu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1251565/","name":"Gwei Lun-Mei"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1233224/","name":"Fan Liao"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224801/","name":"Yi'nan Diao"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063732/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0730865/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0380614/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224801/","name":"Yi'nan Diao"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

A gangster on the run sacrifices everything for his family and a woman he meets while on the lam." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9647768/","name":"Nan fang che zhan de ju hui","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg1ZTZlMmUtM2Y3Yy00YTJjLWJkMTUtZmU2NGU0M2JlYWViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"A gangster on the run sacrifices everything for his family and a woman he meets while on the lam.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9647768/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ayoreinf","dateCreated":"2019-07-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A rare gem of a movie","reviewBody":"I don't rate films 10 very often, you can check my rating history and see for yourselves. this one is a rare combination of technical mastery, as manifest in superb chinematography and lighting work, great editing, amazing acting, that is mainly the two leads who really shine all the way through, Ge Hu as the male lead and Lun-Mei Kwei who in my humble opinion has the most expressive poker face I've ever seen. That is as long as she carries her poker face, when the time comes you'll find she does have more than one facial expression.\n\nOn top of all that, we get a tight story of a Greek tragedy proportions set in modern china, depicting a dark and un forgiving world that borrows a lot from the classics of Melville. If you remember Melville's attitude to the famous "honor among thieves" you'll know what to expect from this movie too. Szpiegomania
S*P*Y*S
programme.desc: S*P*Y*S: Directed by Irvin Kershner. With Elliott Gould, Donald Sutherland, Zouzou, Joss Ackland. Two spies end up being chased by the CIA, the KGB, and a group of anarchists after a botched mission invoked an unwritten "corpse for a corpse" pact." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0072107/","name":"S*P*Y*S","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2I1YTUzNDAtY2UyYS00NWQ5LWJjYjUtMmUxNGQzYWFjMzQ5L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two spies end up being chased by the CIA, the KGB, and a group of anarchists after a botched mission invoked an unwritten "corpse for a corpse" pact.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0072107/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TooSlim"},"dateCreated":"2007-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stay Away","reviewBody":"It's been over 30 years since seeing this movie for the first time, and I can still feel the pain. This ranks right up there on my worst movie of all time list. And I am a Sutherland fan. I actually walked out of the theater the first time...and I was on a date! I recently gave it another try, thinking it couldn't possibly have been THAT bad. Nope. I was right the first time. Again, excruciating to watch. I know that they were probably trying to strike gold again by pairing Gould and Sutherland after they played so well together in MASH, but with a story as stupid as this even they can't pull it off. Do yourself a favor, and just re-watch MASH."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":963,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1974-09-05","keywords":"hare krishna,espionage,scene during opening credits,scene during closing credits,paris france","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000661/","name":"Donald Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001285/","name":"Elliott Gould"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958088/","name":"Zouzou"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0449984/","name":"Irvin Kershner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032182/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067477/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119027/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169549/","name":"Lawrence J. programme.title: OUTATIME: Saving the DeLorean Time Machine

OUTATIME: Saving the DeLorean Time Machine
programme.desc: OUTATIME: Saving the DeLorean Time Machine: Directed by Steve Concotelli. With Sean Bishop, Dan Botkin, Mark Dehlinger, Eddie Dennis. OUTATIME... tells the incredible comeback story of the world's most famous movie car - the DeLorean Time Machine from Back to the Future. Plagued by souvenir hunters, rats, and the elements, this cinematic icon seemed destined for the junkyard. Out of Time... chronicles the efforts of Back to the Future Co-creator / Producer Bob Gale, Universal Studios, and the trilogy's dedicated fan community as they tirelessly work together to bring the Time Machine back to life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4525694/","name":"OUTATIME: Saving the DeLorean Time Machine","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk5Nzg5MjM0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzEzMzIzNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"OUTATIME... tells the incredible comeback story of the world's most famous movie car - the DeLorean Time Machine from Back to the Future. programme.title: Rykoszety
Rykoszety
programme.desc: Rykoszety: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Two coal miner brothers react differently to the oppressive police state. While Tadek prefers to retreat into neutrality, Janek chooses active engagement in the democratic underground. When Janek asks Tadek to store some anti-government leaflets on the second anniversary of Solidarity's 1980 strikes, he triggers a spiral of events that will have everyone's allegiances and characters severely tested." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8658144/","name":"Rykoszety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc0ZGJlOTUtYWM5NS00MjY3LWE5YzYtNWQxMjYyNDU5NjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. IMDb data; ttnr: 8658144, Title: Rykoszety, --- Description: Rykoszety: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Two coal miner brothers react differently to the oppressive police state. While Tadek prefers to retreat into neutrality, Janek chooses active engagement in the democratic underground. When Janek asks Tadek to store some anti-government leaflets on the second anniversary of Solidarity's 1980 strikes, he triggers a spiral of events that will have everyone's allegiances and characters severely tested." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8658144/","name":"Rykoszety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc0ZGJlOTUtYWM5NS00MjY3LWE5YzYtNWQxMjYyNDU5NjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. programme.title: Tumbledown
Nie ma mowy!
Tumbledown
programme.desc:
Tumbledown: Directed by Sean Mewshaw. With Rebecca Hall, Jason Sudeikis, Joe Manganiello, Dianna Agron. A young woman struggles to move on with her life after the death of her husband, an acclaimed folk singer, when a brash New York writer forces her to confront her loss and the ambiguous circumstances of his death." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2338424/","name":"Tumbledown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MzkwOTQ1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjcxMzg2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman struggles to move on with her life after the death of her husband, an acclaimed folk singer, when a brash New York writer forces her to confront her loss and the ambiguous circumstances of his death.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2338424/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"karthikchsharry"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Almost touches Great - But settles for Decent","reviewBody":"Tumbledown is that kind of movie which makes you feel "Oh! It's good. But it should have been better". You'd almost feel sorry for the entire cast because they have given such exceptional performances only to be let down by clichéd writing towards the end. But it still is a Dramedy worth watching.

Coming to the performances, there are absolutely no complaints here. I can safely say that Jason Sudeikis steals the show with his charm and timing. Rebecca Hall gives her best and suits for the role well. In fact we can watch the movie just for the leads' performances. The supporting cast does justice to their roles.

Verdict: Go for it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7234,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-02-05","keywords":"singer songwriter,widow single man relationship,log cabin,boxer the dog,dog","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2342696217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NTk3MDg0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDQ0MjU2NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NTk3MDg0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDQ0MjU2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman struggles to move on with her life after the death of her husband, an acclaimed folk singer, when a brash New York writer forces her to confront her loss and the ambiguous circumstances of his death."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0356017/","name":"Rebecca Hall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837177/","name":"Jason Sudeikis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001100/","name":"Blythe Danner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0582950/","name":"Sean Mewshaw"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0545944/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0534767/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0582950/","name":"Sean Mewshaw"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597917/","name":"Desi van Til"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Last Rampage: The Escape of Gary Tison
Last Rampage: The Escape of Gary Tison
programme.desc: Last Rampage: The Escape of Gary Tison: Directed by Dwight H. Little. With Robert Patrick, Heather Graham, Bruce Davison, Alex MacNicoll. The true story of the infamous prison break of Gary Tison and Randy Greenwalt from the Arizona State prison in Florence, AZ, in the summer of 1978." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5833186/","name":"Last Rampage: The Escape of Gary Tison","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU2ZGNkNDctYTJkYS00YzQ0LTk3MzUtZDI1MjZkYTFhNmFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTcwMjE4MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The true story of the infamous prison break of Gary Tison and Randy Greenwalt from the Arizona State prison in Florence, AZ, in the summer of 1978.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5833186/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ourclub"},"dateCreated":"2018-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Saguaros vs. Joshua Trees","reviewBody":"Way too many Joshua Trees for the actual territory this crime spree covered. The Tisons meandered through Arizona towards Yuma, then up to Flagstaff, briefly into eastern NM, southwestern CO and back into AZ towards Casa Grande. They were ultimately stopped near AZ City. Someone noted in the "Errors" section that saguaros only grow in southern AZ. While most saguaros grow down Tucson way, you will find them naturally from Phoenix south and out along I-8 to Yuma. There are a lot growing in areas near Casa Grande so that part is accurate. Joshua Trees grow primarily in CA so there would have been few to none in the areas covered by Tison gang. This was probably filmed in Mojave.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1740,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2017-09-22","keywords":"florence arizona,arizona,arizona desert,arizona state prison,quartzsite arizona","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3424893209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJhZjFjNWMtOGE1Ni00NDM4LWI5NmUtY2NmODk0ZjVhNWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJhZjFjNWMtOGE1Ni00NDM4LWI5NmUtY2NmODk0ZjVhNWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1978 convicted murderer Gary Tison (Robert Patrick) and his cellmate Randy Greenawalt (Chris Browning) staged a daring escape from an Arizona State Prison, with the help of Tison's three teenage sons. Their murderous rampage through the southwestern desert shocked the nation with its brutality. While Sheriff Cooper (Bruce Davison) hunted them down, Tison's wife (Heather Graham) vehemently defended her family in the press."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001598/","name":"Robert Patrick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001287/","name":"Heather Graham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001117/","name":"Bruce Davison"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0514546/","name":"Dwight H. programme.title: Crash Landing
Twarde lądowanie
Crash Landing
programme.desc: Crash Landing: Directed by Jim Wynorski. With Antonio Sabato Jr., Michael Paré, Brianne Davis, Kevin Dobson. When a hostage situation arises on a private plane with the daughter of a billionaire on board, Major John Masters (Antonio Sabato Jr.) teams up with Captain Williams (Michael Paré) to stop the terrorists and land the plane." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0385622/","name":"Crash Landing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNkMWE5Y2QtZDc3MS00MDBmLWI0MTItZTE4Zjc0NGIxNmZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a hostage situation arises on a private plane with the daughter of a billionaire on board, Major John Masters (Antonio Sabato Jr.) teams up with Captain Williams (Michael Paré) to stop the terrorists and land the plane.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0385622/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"An utter wreck of a movie","reviewBody":"Even if not expecting a huge amount in the first place, you do not expect to see a movie this bad. This was exactly the case with Crash Landing, the only good thing being how well it managed to live up to its title. It is very choppily edited, almost as if the whole movie was made in a desperate rush. The story didn't involve at all, and further disadvantaged by sluggish pacing, too many ridiculous moments to list and the action-like sequences hopelessly contrived. The characters are little more than walking clichés that we learn nothing about and end up hating so much, while the acting is terrible especially from that non-entity Antonio Sabbato Jnr. But if there is anything that fared the absolute worst here, it was the dialogue, it was laughably cringe worthy and the cheese factor is constantly hit right at you. In conclusion, an utter wreck with nothing to redeem it other than the irony of its title. 1/10 Bethany Cox","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":864,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-07-09","keywords":"kidnapping,villainess,terrorist,hostage,hurricane","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004645/","name":"Antonio Sabato Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001595/","name":"Michael Paré"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1732403/","name":"Brianne Davis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0691061/","name":"Jim Wynorski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0091470/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083590/","name":"Paul A. In a near future, due to the effects of an uncompromising law on the eco-sustainability of supports, paper has become a rare item, a luxury possession, controlled by the "Big Z": Zimurgh Corporation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4656810/","name":"The Broken Key","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzExNGVhMjktZjg2MS00NWNhLTlmMDMtY2U5ZDdhOWVkN2QyL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM1OTI0ODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a near future, due to the effects of an uncompromising law on the eco-sustainability of supports, paper has become a rare item, a luxury possession, controlled by the "Big Z": Zimurgh Corporation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4656810/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"johan-83-77031"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nice shot, horrible acting, horrible sound","reviewBody":"The shots are so nice, the plot has possibilities. But the movie lacks direction, refinement, and certainly money. All the sound is post-synced. Even Rutger Hauer has a foreign accent!\n\nHorrible, had to stop after 25 minutes.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":377,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.8,"genre":["History","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-11-16","keywords":"future","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer - The Broken Key","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3427515161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE4ZWZiZGYtNWU2MS00MWRjLTg3MWEtZTVhMWVmMjdkMDJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE4ZWZiZGYtNWU2MS00MWRjLTg3MWEtZTVhMWVmMjdkMDJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Broken Key", by Louis Nero Cast: Christopher Lambert, Rutger Hauer, Geraldine Chaplin, Michael Madsen, William Baldwin, Franco Nero, Kabir Bedi, Maria De Medeiros, Marc Fiorini","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000442/","name":"Rutger Hauer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000514/","name":"Michael Madsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000483/","name":"Christopher Lambert"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2284169/","name":"Louis Nero"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180729/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0534936/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2284169/","name":"Louis Nero","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5632526/","name":"Giancarlo Guerreri","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3762334/","name":"As Chianese"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Freeheld
Tytuł do praw
Freeheld
programme.desc:
Freeheld: Directed by Peter Sollett. With Julianne Moore, Elliot Page, Michael Shannon, Steve Carell. New Jersey police lieutenant Laurel Hester and her registered domestic partner Stacie Andree battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1658801/","name":"Freeheld","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM5NTg3NjU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzAwMjA3NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Jersey police lieutenant Laurel Hester and her registered domestic partner Stacie Andree battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1658801/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bkoganbing"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"True Love, believe the evidence of your own eyes","reviewBody":"One of the things that has always annoyed me about people opposing gay rights laws is the absolute refusal of the opposition especially those religiously based to recognize romantic love. It's not recognized in the holy works of religion therefore it doesn't exist. Even in this film where we are talking about two people in love. Believe the evidence of your own eyes about Laurel Hester and Stacie Andree in the film Freeheld.

I worked for NYS Crime Victims Board and in death I came in contact with a lot of ordinary LGBTQ people who in death had their lives magnified far more than what they did in their lives. Such is the case with Laurel Hester who was a detective with the Ocean County Police in New Jersey. I'm not sure she was closeted, but she certainly was discreet in her male dominated work place.

Discretion went out the window when she meets Stacie Andree a much younger woman at a softball game. The two start living together and while it's not all roses, the commitment is truly there.

And then cancer strikes and what to do about whatever estate Hester might leave. This story illustrates precisely the problem that LGBTQ people had before marriage settled the issue permanently. You could in some places get a domestic partnership certificate and have the relationship recorded. But it wasn't mandated that private industry and government recognize it.

Thus was the issue of the film as the town of Freehold and its governing body would not extend survivor benefits to Ms. Andree. They were not married, but legally they could not get married. At least without a lot of agitation and organizing.

Which is where Steve Carrell as Steven Goldstein comes in, leading the same sex marriage lobbying group. The issue as he says is so neatly encapsulated in the problem that Hester and Andree face.

Two things I liked about Freeheld that make this a special film. One was the chemistry between Julianne Moore and Ellen Page as Laurel and Stacy. They made me believe the love was real.

The second was the scenes among Laurel's police colleagues with her and among themselves. The differing reactions was a sampling of straight and male America, quite nicely documented.

Freeheld is a great film showing the need for same sex marriage as few others have.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12366,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-02-10","keywords":"lesbian kiss,gay bar,partner,cancer,public hearing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3415913241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDM5NzA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTExMTUzNjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDM5NzA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTExMTUzNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decorated New Jersey police detective, Laurel is diagnosed with cancer and wants to leave her hard earned pension to her domestic partner, Stacie. However the county officials, Freeholders, conspire to prevent Laurel from doing this. Hard-nosed detective Dane Wells, and activist Steven Goldstein, unite in Laurel and StacieÂ’s defense, rallying police officers and ordinary citizens to support their struggle for equality. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680983/","name":"Elliot Page"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0813164/","name":"Peter Sollett"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118437/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0112971/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518293/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0638913/","name":"Ron Nyswaner"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Killer Bees
Mordercze pszczoły
Killer Bees!
programme.desc:
Killer Bees: Directed by Penelope Buitenhuis. With C. Thomas Howell, Tracy Nelson, Fiona Loewi, Noel Fisher. After a truck accident causes their release, a small rural town is faced with a swarm of killer bees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0353625/","name":"Killer Bees","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU5OTU2NzAtNTA5Ny00MTc3LTlkOGMtNjIxMzVmOTA0MTlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIzMTQ5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a truck accident causes their release, a small rural town is faced with a swarm of killer bees.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0353625/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awful indeed","reviewBody":"My review of KILLER BEES!, a silly and no-budget TV movie from 2002, will go off on a tangent because of personal reasons. I found the tone of the script particularly offensive, particularly in the depiction of multiple sclerosis. I write as somebody married to an MS sufferer, and I can report that the MS portrayed in this film is even more ridiculous than the stuff involving the killer bees. The character doesn't act like somebody with MS in the slightest, the symptoms as described are wrong, and to top it all they describe MS as a 'terminal illness'. It's sloppy writing, and had me fuming.

Still, at least it enlivened what is otherwise an entirely forgettable movie. KILLER BEES! follows the same old hackneyed storyline with a single character (THE HITCHER'S C. Thomas Howell, looking old and tired) who recognises the impending threat while nobody else believes him. Inevitably, there's a big event coming up, and the greedy Mayor refuses to cancel it. What makes KILLER BEES! stand out is how poorly the action is staged, in addition to the terrible calibre of the special effects.

The PG rating is the final insult; if this had contained some proper gore effects a la PIRANHA 3D, I could have forgiven it for the rest of the problems. Instead, it plays it safe throughout, and the shots of bees are limited to just a few CGI clouds in the skies. It's nonsense and the cast of badly-acting townsfolk hardly serve to increase the entertainment value. In a world of bad films, KILLER BEES! is the worst bee B-movie yet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":876,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-11-19","keywords":"psychotronic film,creature feature,bee,killer bee,bee attack","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001367/","name":"C. Thomas Howell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0625796/","name":"Tracy Nelson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517370/","name":"Fiona Loewi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0119689/","name":"Penelope Buitenhuis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074385/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045895/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2091795/","name":"Dana Stone"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Heaven
Niebo
Heaven
programme.desc:
Heaven: Directed by Tom Tykwer. With Cate Blanchett, Giovanni Ribisi, Remo Girone, Stefania Rocca. A woman takes the law into her own hands after police ignore her pleas to arrest the man responsible for her husband's death, and finds herself not only under arrest for murder but falling in love with an officer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0246677/","name":"Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjdjOTMyZGEtYjZhNi00ZTE1LWExYTUtNzI1NzZlY2ExMzVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyOTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman takes the law into her own hands after police ignore her pleas to arrest the man responsible for her husband's death, and finds herself not only under arrest for murder but falling in love with an officer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0246677/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mail4gus"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply Not Good...","reviewBody":"Ok, this is my second movie of this director after Lola Renn. First when you watch the DVD cover you see two superb actors as Giovanni Ribisi and Cate Blanchett (Both also in The Gift, that is a Raimi's excellent thriller) and also watch that is from Tykwer (specifically says "From the same director as Lola Renn"), you'll think that you are just ahead to watch an excellent movie. The start of the movie show some action but 10 minutes later the story starts to slow down and to became into a fictional story that try to make you think that Phillipo is an Angel who born the same day and hour than Phillipa and that his destiny is to help (and also fall in love!) Phillipa to escape from the law because she killed 4 innocent people when she was trying to set a bomb to kill the drug dealer who supplied the drug to her exhusband who died for an overdoze (besides that she was unfaithful in her marriage)!!!!!!!! can you imagine what a stupid and inmoral screenplay?... Things get worse when Phillipo help to Blanchett role to kill the drug dealer!... (very nice Guardian Angel!)

The last part is even worst, the scene where they escape in a helicopter from the police and dissapear in "Heaven", what a symbolic end! lol.

I enjoyed Lola Renn and the Color Trilogy, and i don't have anything bad to say about Blanchett or Ribisi, they have decent performs and the photography and locations are also good, but this story is not good at all!...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":25335,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-02-21","keywords":"fantastical ending,love,death,bomb,police","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2250745369","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGMwNmFjMWUtODRmYy00MTM3LTgyNjktMjJiYmI3MDZmNTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGMwNmFjMWUtODRmYy00MTM3LTgyNjktMjJiYmI3MDZmNTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT# 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000610/","name":"Giovanni Ribisi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320969/","name":"Remo Girone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038270/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001425/","name":"Krzysztof Kieslowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682830/","name":"Krzysztof Piesiewicz"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shadow Builder
Cień bestii
Shadow Builder
programme.desc: Shadow Builder: Directed by Jamie Dixon. With Michael Rooker, Leslie Hope, Shawn Thompson, Andrew Jackson. A demon is summoned to take the soul of a young boy, who has the potential to become a saint. By doing this, he will open a doorway to Hell, and destroy the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117611/","name":"Shadow Builder","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGI0MzAxMDctMDRkZC00NDhiLTg3ZGItNDM2YzBkODE3MzViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0NTI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A demon is summoned to take the soul of a young boy, who has the potential to become a saint. By doing this, he will open a doorway to Hell, and destroy the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117611/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lost-in-limbo"},"dateCreated":"2012-05-22","inLanguage":"English","name":""Hell will no longer be denied"","reviewBody":"Get the ingredients for a little made b-film and throw Bram Stocker in as inspiration for the story. A demonic force is summoned to take the soul of a young boy who could become a saint and if done it could open a doorway to hell. However this entity can only travel through shadows and needs to collect souls to complete this task. But on its trail is Father Vassey, who's heading to this sleepy rural town to find the boy first. The occult horror "Shadow Builder" is an adaptation of a Stocker story and the screenplay only seems to muddled it up with half-baked theories, as it leans towards its cheesy special effects, nasty shocks and poignant performances led by Michael Rooker's grizzled renegade priest who gets around with pistols than say a bible and Tony Todd as some loony giggling Jamaican hermit that kids are afraid of. Actually "Shadow Builder" isn't all that bad, but in parts it's fairly amusing and surprisingly dark in its atmospherics. The opening scenes are actually quite fun. Over-the-top and silly, but fun especially seeing Rooker at work in his choice of repenting sinners. The demonic entity has some striking facial details, but basically it's black CGI smoke and like most villainous horror characters has something cleverly smart to say. With this last point, I thought it would have been better suited if it said nothing at all. The direction is rather stylised for its low- budget, but the plot doesn't meander much and it has enough thrills in its formulaic patterns of good vs. evil or light vs. darkness. A young Kevin Zegers stars as the kid caught in the middle of it all.\n\n"Are you truly repentant?"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1570,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1998-02-07","keywords":"female nudity,gore,demon,saint,soul","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bram Stoker's Shadowbuilder","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3451584793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgwMjFkM2QtZGFhNC00NjUxLWI3NGQtZGVmZjkwMjVlMGE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgwMjFkM2QtZGFhNC00NjUxLWI3NGQtZGVmZjkwMjVlMGE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sterling Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0740264/","name":"Michael Rooker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394012/","name":"Leslie Hope"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860705/","name":"Shawn Thompson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228858/","name":"Jamie Dixon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032540/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831370/","name":"Michael Stokes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831290/","name":"Bram Stoker"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Der Name der Rose
Imię róży
Der Name der Rose
programme.desc:
Der Name der Rose: Directed by Jean-Jacques Annaud. With Sean Connery, Christian Slater, Helmut Qualtinger, Elya Baskin. An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0091605/","name":"Der Name der Rose","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEyZTdhNDMtMWFkMS00ZmRjLWEyNmEtZDU3MWFkNDEzMDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0091605/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MinorityReporter"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent - despite the film medium's short comings!","reviewBody":"Der Name der Rose is by all means a great film. The story is an excellent mix of Sherlock Holmes-type crime thriller and religious criticism/commentary. I found this to be exceptional as the book was labeled as impossible to remake as a film and while the book is indeed better than the film, the film is certainly not without its charms.

First of all the cast is pretty much perfect. Reading the book Sean Connery wasn't who I had in mind as the character but he certainly makes the character his own. His performance is for lack of a better word unique. He brings his usual indescribable something to the character which makes him almost instantly likable and believable. He delivers his lines in a confident manner that suits the character. Like in many other of his films his character is a teacher character but he does not seem to berate his pupil (Christian Slater) but allows him to grow on his own merely nudging him along. Even though not my first choice to have played the character I cannot find any other who would suit the part after seeing the film. Christian Slater plays the protagonist in what must be described as his break through character. His inexperience as an actor shows and once again suits the character who is also quite inexperienced in many ways. He portrays the change and ultimate conflicts of his character well enough and like Connery makes the character his own. Michael Lonsdale is pretty good as well and even though the character is not as well defined as in the book he provides the broad strokes in a satisfactory manner. Feodor Chaliapin Jr. does an excellent job in bringing Jorge to life and matches Connery's authority in their scenes together but once again the character is done in pretty broad strokes and you only get a small taste of what the character was like in the book. F. Murray Abraham's character is not like in the book and even though I was slightly disappointed by the film's portrayal of the character I understand why it was necessary to change the character for dramatic purposes. Ron Perlman who has since gone on to become quite a big star has a small role in this film and he does a decent job.

The film thrives on its complex story (which is nowhere near as complex as in the book) and deep characterization of the main characters who are about as defined as characters can become without internal monologue. There is voice-over by the older version of Christian Slater's character but is basically only used in the introduction and end part of the film and at a few crucial moments. The fantastic characterization is also helped by the incredibly sharp and well written dialog which never gets boring or forced like you could have feared given the religious content. In many scenes the dialog was in fact so good that I got the chills. The film focuses mainly on the mystery elements but the religious elements of the film are somehow weaved into the overall plot but there were plenty more of these religious elements and factors in the book. Overall I think the film should have been at least 15 minutes longer to get more of these elements in but maybe thats just me. However, all the most important plot points (and a few sub-plots) are covered so in that sense the film is successful.

Another thing that works very well is the atmosphere of the film which is very tense and mysterious. The tension is helped by the music which like so many other things in the film is quite unique and fitting. The set work is pretty simple but as it is a monastery you cannot expect the most flamboyant of sets. The sets work in their simplicity, however, and there is really no point of critique to be found in the set work. The lighting is kept at a minimum as well and once again this works in favor of the film as it adds to the overall tension. Sometimes the lighting is a little to dark but it happens so rarely that its not really a problem.

All in all Der Name der Rose (or The Name of the Rose) is a wonderful film but what drags the film down ever so slightly is that it can some times feel a little rushed because of the amount of material it is covering and there were a few elements from the book I would have liked to have seen in the film. In general, however, the cross from book to film is very well done and the overall plot is very well depicted with many tense, frightening and interesting moments. The film is definitely one of Connery's best and it is mainly because of his performance that I am giving the film a 9 in stead of an 8

9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106166,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","History","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1986-10-17","keywords":"middle ages,abbey,monk,franciscan,14th century","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000125/","name":"Sean Connery"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000225/","name":"Christian Slater"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702818/","name":"Helmut Qualtinger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000269/","name":"Jean-Jacques Annaud"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013358/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0248767/","name":"Umberto Eco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001949/","name":"Andrew Birkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102722/","name":"Gérard Brach"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Snowmageddon: Directed by Sheldon Wilson. With David Cubitt, Laura Harris, Dylan Matzke, Magda Apanowicz. An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1876446/","name":"Snowmageddon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJkNGFiYTctNmRmMi00Mzc3LWJiZWYtN2RhNDkyZWFjYTBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the g","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1876446/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"werewulfmom"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dumb but fun","reviewBody":"There are movies that are so bad they're good, and movies that are just bad. 

This one is in between. As quirky Christmas movies go, this is kind of fun, but it truly needs to be seen to be believed. A family discovers that the snow globe they've received as a gift is causing big troubles in their peaceful town. It takes a while for the main characters to believe in an evil snow globe (heck, I"m still having trouble believing it) but once they get on board they have to figure out a way to return the gift and stop the SNOWMAGEDDON!

And then it's time for eggnog!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1177,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-12-10","keywords":"disaster film,globe,christmas,snow,the family","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190931/","name":"David Cubitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364977/","name":"Laura Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3676866/","name":"Dylan Matzke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934135/","name":"Sheldon Wilson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337940/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0998149/","name":"Rudy Thauberger"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1876446, Title: Snowmageddon, --- Description: Snowmageddon: Directed by Sheldon Wilson. With David Cubitt, Laura Harris, Dylan Matzke, Magda Apanowicz. An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1876446/","name":"Snowmageddon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJkNGFiYTctNmRmMi00Mzc3LWJiZWYtN2RhNDkyZWFjYTBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the g","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1876446/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"werewulfmom","dateCreated":"2011-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dumb but fun","reviewBody":"There are movies that are so bad they're good, and movies that are just bad. 

This one is in between. As quirky Christmas movies go, this is kind of fun, but it truly needs to be seen to be believed. A family discovers that the snow globe they've received as a gift is causing big troubles in their peaceful town. It takes a while for the main characters to believe in an evil snow globe (heck, I"m still having trouble believing it) but once they get on board they have to figure out a way to return the gift and stop the SNOWMAGEDDON!

And then it's time for eggnog!!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1177,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-12-10","keywords":"disaster film,globe,christmas,snow,the family","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190931/","name":"David Cubitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364977/","name":"Laura Harris","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3676866/","name":"Dylan Matzke"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934135/","name":"Sheldon Wilson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337940/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0998149/","name":"Rudy Thauberger"],"duration":"PT1H29M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lavalantula
Lawalantula
Lavalantula
programme.desc:
Lavalantula: Directed by Mike Mendez. With Steve Guttenberg, Nia Peeples, Patrick Renna, Carlos Bernard. Volcanic eruptions in Los Angeles unleash a swarm of gigantic, lava-breathing tarantulas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4060576/","name":"Lavalantula","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMTY5OTEzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzgwODM2NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Volcanic eruptions in Los Angeles unleash a swarm of gigantic, lava-breathing tarantulas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4060576/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"room102"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oh, what a Sholock! What a lovely Shlock!","reviewBody":"A made for TV shlock by Syfy about giant lava spiders. You know what you're in for and you get exactly what you expect.

Steve Guttenberg (yes, he's still alive! He was unfrozen from the 80's) is an ex-famous actor, that somehow keeps getting into the TV news every 10 minutes. He encounters giant lava spiders, bad actors and terrible script and has to face them all - will he succeed?

The wooden direction and bad effects make the phrase "disaster movie" get more than one meaning. Terrible dialog, bad acting by the entire cast and awful direction - from staring into the wrong direction of the next effect shot, news anchor that is taken straight from a 70's students class of acting, car driving with exaggerated steering motions of the wheel which you haven't seen since the 60's, and up to a cop that stands behind a news reporter and keeps null signaling people who walk on the street. You simply have to watch this one.

This movie is wonderfully terrible and it goes straight into the "so bad it's good" list. Watch it with your friends, watch it when you're drunk, watch it when you're unconscious - you'll get a good time. Great stuff!

To its credit, the movie is self-aware (there is a hilarious cameo that I won't spoil for you) and it's not a "San Andreas" blockbuster-budget movie that takes itself seriously.

Conveniently, the movie is just 79 minutes long, but the last third changes from "so bad it's good" to just "bad" and finally to jumping the shark (or the spider).

Believe it or not, there is already a planned sequel.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3028,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-07-25","keywords":"giant spider,family man,tremor,shaker,shotgun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lavalantula","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4037653017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJlMjMwOTYtMTJmMi00NjQ3LTk0ZmQtM2I5YmEzYTU4YzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJlMjMwOTYtMTJmMi00NjQ3LTk0ZmQtM2I5YmEzYTU4YzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Lavalantula"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000430/","name":"Steve Guttenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001604/","name":"Nia Peeples"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719606/","name":"Patrick Renna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579079/","name":"Mike Mendez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140089/","name":"Neil Elman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579079/","name":"Mike Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4639862/","name":"Ashley O'Neil"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Eichmann Show
Eichmann Show
The Eichmann Show
programme.desc:
The Eichmann Show: Directed by Paul Andrew Williams. With Martin Freeman, Anthony LaPaglia, Rebecca Front, Andy Nyman. Dramatisation of the team hoping to televise the trial of Adolf Eichmann, an infamous Nazi responsible for the deaths of millions of Jews. It focuses on Leo Hurwitz, a documentary film-maker and Milton Fruchtman, a producer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4163668/","name":"The Eichmann Show","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNDI5MTM2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc0ODcyNDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dramatisation of the team hoping to televise the trial of Adolf Eichmann, an infamous Nazi responsible for the deaths of millions of Jews. It focuses on Leo Hurwitz, a documentary film-maker and Milton Fruchtman, a producer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4163668/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Prismark10"},"dateCreated":"2015-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"The face of evil","reviewBody":"The Eichmann Show is a documentary drama about the televising of Adolf Eichmann's 1961 trial in Israel after he was captured in Argentina. Eichmann was regarded as one of the architect's of the final reckoning which led to the deaths of countless Jews and others.

Anthony LaPaglia is the television director Leo Hurwitz and Martin Freeman is the producer Milton Fruchtman who set about televising what became known at the time as the 'trial of the century' as it was broadcast in 37 countries over four months. It was maybe the first time witnesses described the horrors of the concentration camp to a wider public. As the hotelier, Mrs Landau (Rebecca Front) informs her guest, many people simply could not believe such events had occurred during the second world war.

Although Fruchtman had been given permission to film the trial by the authorities the Judges were uneasy as they felt the television cameras and the noise they made would be a distraction and they set about to hide the cameras or disguise them so they would be intrusive.

The film inter-cuts the black and white real trial footage. The historic documentary footage of the victims of concentration camps is rather distressing. Eichmann is impassive throughout the trial as the footage is shown and witnesses testimony is given.

Its a worthy piece but the drama was rather bland. Of course the historic footage is shocking and sickening, the dramatised parts in contrast failed to enthral me. I felt a better constructed documentary would had told the story better with the historical footage.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4753,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2015-01-20","keywords":"trial,adolf eichmann,genocide,israel,nazi war criminal","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293509/","name":"Martin Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001439/","name":"Anthony LaPaglia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0296410/","name":"Rebecca Front"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1440314/","name":"Paul Andrew Williams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0100771/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0268483/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1171030/","name":"Simon Block"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lawa
programme.desc: Lori (Valérie Valois) i John (Ian Ziering) Wilsonowie nie są zbyt udanym małżeństwem. Często się kłócą, co negatywnie odbija się na ich relacjach z dziećmi. Oboje pracują w centrum reagowania kryzysowego. Pewnego dnia dowiadują się o wzroście aktywności gigantycznego wulkanu. Wydobywająca się z niego lawa zagraża nie tylko okolicznym terenom, ale i całej Ziemi. Lori i John muszą szybko wymyślić sposób, jak uchronić ludzkość przed efektami klęski żywiołowej.

A woman takes the law into her own hands after police ignore her pleas to arrest the man responsible for her husband's death, and finds herself not only under arrest for murder but falling in love with an officer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0246677/","name":"Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjdjOTMyZGEtYjZhNi00ZTE1LWExYTUtNzI1NzZlY2ExMzVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyOTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman takes the law into her own hands after police ignore her pleas to arrest the man responsible for her husband's death, and finds herself not only under arrest for murder but falling in love with an officer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0246677/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mail4gus"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply Not Good...","reviewBody":"Ok, this is my second movie of this director after Lola Renn. a really fun movie to watch","reviewBody":"well i wasn't expecting anything special from this movie, but i was actually surprised, the story seemed somewhat thrown together but still half-ways interesting, the acting was good for saying that the only actors i recognized were Jamie Lee Curtis, Busta Rhymes, and Ryan Merriman.. the music was still good, and the whole idea though not a great one, was fun, i also thoroughly enjoyed the way they did the cameras, that was a genius idea.. i recommend this movie to anyone, and i don't understand why so many people don't like this movie, because its loads of fun to watch.. the movie may not have a great story or award winning actors, but its still surprising and fun, thus concludes my review of Halloween programme.title: Nightbreed
Nocne plemię
Nightbreed
programme.desc:
Nightbreed: Directed by Clive Barker. With Craig Sheffer, Anne Bobby, David Cronenberg, Charles Haid. A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100260/","name":"Nightbreed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmFlMWFiM2ItNWQ1Yy00ZDE2LWEzNmUtOTE0MDM4YjVjNmYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100260/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"PatrickH-2"},"dateCreated":"1999-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Fascinating","reviewBody":"Fascinating is an excellent word to describe NIGHTBREED: it doesn't necessarily mean it is good or bad, just interesting. Indeed, Im still not sure whether or not this film is good or bad.

On the credits side, the sets, costumes, make-up, special effects, even the matte paintings are gorgeous, grotesque, perfect for what is required. I was amazed that such fantastic production values could be found in a movie that on the surface seems so schlocky. There is such a wealth of imagination here that one can hardly take time out to think about the flaws. I was so amazed by the knock-out apocalyptic finale that I could barely think about how silly the context is (a bunch of redneck Canadians blow-torching a cemetary.)

he film's biggest flaw is it's sheer magnitude- there are SO many characters, plots, subtexts, overlays, and so on, that no really coherent or involving center emerges. It can be interpreted as: a story about how love conquers the supernatural (a la Dead Again), a Silence-of-the-lambs-like psychodrama about a serial killer; a dreamy horror flick reminiscent of Nightmare on Elm Street and especially Little Monsters; a Gilliam-inspired fantasy (the teeming underworld city is strongly reminiscent of Brazil and the Fortress of Ultimate Darkness in Time Bandits, while other parts are reminiscent of The Adventures of Baron Munchausen); a symbolic tale of racial tolerance; and on and on. So much happens, so many characters are involved, so many subtexts present themselves, its hard to know what is going on at all.

Still, one really does have to see the film to believe it. The underworld city is stunning, its atmosphere created perfectly by both the production design and a series of bizarre tableaux of its residents. It is a mark of Barker's screenwriting talent (so often evident in his other films if you can look beneath the shlock) that all the characters, even monsters seen only briefly, ring true in some strange way. The many stories are actually touching. Also, the ending is cleverly conceived; it doesnt go out of its way to leave the door open for a sequel, rather the open door is integral to the plot. I would love to see a follow-up just to know how Barker carries through the mythical aspects he introduces in this film's last part.

Perhaps the film could have been more focused, with fewer subsidiary characters; perhaps the completely inappropriate (but obviously intentional) humor could have been dropped; perhaps the entire serial-killer sub-plot could have been excised completely. In any case, this film is a knock-out."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22096,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"1990-02-16","keywords":"mad doctor,motel,surrealism,supernatural power,surprise ending","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Nightbreed","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2274951449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2ZiZmUxNzgtMTYwMS00M2RmLWJhMGItOGI1NDhhNzhiYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2ZiZmUxNzgtMTYwMS00M2RmLWJhMGItOGI1NDhhNzhiYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Extra (Clip) from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001729/","name":"Craig Sheffer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000343/","name":"David Cronenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0090321/","name":"Anne Bobby"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000850/","name":"Clive Barker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045933/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000850/","name":"Clive Barker"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="
